trans-unit.source: Represents a tabular data source view on XML data for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma exibição da fonte de dados tabulares em dados XML para um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controle pode apresentar os dados subjacentes em formato tabular e hierárquico para controles de servidor Web que associar ao proprietário.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> to bind to XML data and present it in list or tabular form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to XML data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: Controla como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>para associar a dados XML e apresentá-lo na lista ou formato de tabela, enquanto os controles que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, associar a dados XML e apresentá-los de forma hierárquica.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> creates each view type internally through different code paths.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>cria cada tipo de exibição internamente por meio de caminhos de código diferente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>, an XmlDataSourceView is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>método é chamado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>é criado um XmlDataSourceView por <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> is created.

The XmlDataSourceView class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: A classe XmlDataSourceView é fornecida para controles de servidor Web que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>e vincula a listas e dados tabulares, enquanto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView>é fornecido para controles de servidor Web que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>e associar a dados hierárquicos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Internally, all data-bound control methods call the `Select` method on whichever data source view object is returned.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, todos os métodos de controle associado a dados chamam o `Select` método em qualquer objeto de exibição de fonte de dados será retornado.

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> helper objects, the XmlDataSourceView defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Como todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>objetos auxiliares, o XmlDataSourceView define as operações que pode ser executadas a fonte de dados com os dados subjacentes.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the XmlDataSourceView class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control does not support update, insert, or delete operations.
trans-unit.target: Porque o XmlDataSourceView apenas substituições de classe a <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>método, o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controle não dá suporte à atualização, inserção ou operações de exclusão.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the XmlDataSourceView class is sealed, you cannot extend the XmlDataSourceView class to add this functionality, but you can derive a data source control from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> and a view from <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> if you require additional functionality.
trans-unit.target: Porque a classe XmlDataSourceView for fechada, você não pode estender a classe XmlDataSourceView para adicionar essa funcionalidade, mas você pode derivar um controle de fonte de dados de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>e um modo de exibição de <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>se você precisar de funcionalidade adicional.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new named instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView"></xref> class, and associates the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> with it.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância nomeada do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView"> </xref> classe e associa especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"> </xref> com ele.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView"></xref> is associated with.
Retrieves a list of data rows from the underlying XML.
trans-unit.target: Recupera uma lista de linhas de dados XML subjacente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> objeto que é usado para solicitar operações nos dados além da recuperação de dados básico.
